name: DIE versus DIE
description:
DIE versus DIE is a new tabletop RPG from Meldar16. Best suited for fantasy settings, it includes mechanics on how to resolve challenges by muscle, brains, or magick. While you can play with the standard 7 piece ttrpg dice set, it's preferable that you little dice goblins get a whole stinkin' lot of dice. 

Like many other TTRPGs, players will use their dice and rules to collectively tell a story with a game master running the show. DIE versus DIE will always use dice rolls to resolve challenges and conflicts. The game master sets a difficulty to overcome an obstacle, and the player will succeed or fail based on a die roll corresponding with the player characters' stats and skills. Your standard dice set (the usual d20, d12, d10, d8, d6 & d4) also acts as a meter for the current potency of those same attributes.
